channel.title: CVE Feed for BeyondTrust -- BeyondInsight
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BeyondTrust -- BeyondInsight

item.title: CVE-2024-4219|2024-08-01T20:33:52.999Z -- beyondtrust -- beyondinsight
item.description: Prior to 23.2, it is possible to perform arbitrary Server-Side requests via HTTP-based connectors within BeyondInsight, resulting in a server-side request forgery vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-4220|2024-08-01T20:33:53.024Z -- beyondtrust -- beyondinsight
item.description: Prior to 23.1, an information disclosure vulnerability exists within BeyondInsight which can allow an attacker to enumerate usernames.

item.description: Prior to 23.1, an information disclosure vulnerability exists within BeyondInsight which can allow an attacker to enumerate usernames.

item.description: Prior to 23.1, an information disclosure vulnerability exists within BeyondInsight which can allow an attacker to enumerate usernames.
